name: BIOL 280T
title: Cancer Stem Cell Biology
description: Intensive, discussion-based course covering recent published and unpublished research in mechanisms regulating cancer stem cells and metastasis in breast cancer and their relationship with normal stem cells. Students also present their own research and solicit feedback from students and instructors. May be repeated for credit. Enrollment is restricted to graduate students; qualified undergraduates may enroll with permission of instructor. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to graduate students; qualified undergraduates may enroll with permission of instructor.
